uvi.description:
tty: Fix out-of-bound vmalloc access in imageblit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 699d926585daa6ec44be556cdc1ab89e5d54557b. For more details please see the references link.
